sentences.sContent: Voters overwhelmingly rejected the Far Right in the May elections.
sentences.sCn: 在5月的选举中，选民普遍排斥极右政党。

sentences.sContent: In Ireland 83% of voters favoured EC membership in 1972.
sentences.sCn: 1972年，83%的爱尔兰选民赞成加入欧洲共同体。

synos.tran: 选举人，投票人；有投票权者

words.tran: 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认

trans.tranCn: 选举人，投票人；有投票权者
trans.tranOther: someone who has the right to vote in a political election, or who votes in a particular election
